name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Ancell Eugene HAMM, Appellant

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Ancell Eugene HAMM, Appellant.

opinions.text:
OPINION OF THE COURT
PER CURIAM:
The Judgment of Sentence of the Court of Common Pleas of Dauphin County is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Fred T. Cadmus, III and Ronald C. Nagle, Westchester (Court-appointed), for appellant.
Richard A. Lewis, Dist. Atty., Dauphin County, James R. Freeman, Dist. Atty., Chester County, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
425 A.2d 744
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Ancell Eugene HAMM, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Jan. 27, 1981.
Decided Feb. 27, 1981.
Fred T. Cadmus, III and Ronald C. Nagle, Westchester (Court-appointed), for appellant.
Richard A. Lewis, Dist. Atty., Dauphin County, James R. Freeman, Dist. Atty., Chester County, for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
